  1. Hands On
  2. Project File

The QGIS project file (.qgz)

If you haven’t already, Open QGIS 3.10.9 (with GRASS 7.8.3).

In the Browser Panel, navigate to the directory where you added your newly extracted folder called intro-qgis-project-files. Inside you’ll see the vanTreeMap project file. Double-click that file to open the project.

View workshop content in GitHub
